results.title: git is my co-pilot. t-shirt (men's medium)
results.description:
Have an affinity for DVCSes? Has Git saved your bacon on multiple occasions? Show the world how you feel by wearing this t-shirt.

The simple statement "git is my co-pilot." printed on an asphalt American Apparel jersey T-shirt.

Size: Men's Medium

Garment Measurements (in inches):
Length: 29.375
Width: 20

Manufacturer Suggested Body Measurements (in inches):
Chest: 38-40
Waist: 32-34
Inseam: 32

**Note** American Apparel shirts tend to fit a bit snug, so you may want to order a size larger than you normally wear.

Designed by Owen Shifflett (http://owenshifflett.com)
